page.title: 20Churchgoing
page.content: The community of Stackpole is predominantly Church of Wales.Within the parish boundaries are two churches but no chapels and there is only one chapelgoer(Baptist)living in the area. The present rector has been incumbent of the parish for a little over two years.At first his ministry was confined to the churches of Stackpole and St.Petrox,but in January 1985 it was extended to include Bosherston and St.Twynnells when their rector retired. Churchgoing habits are as follows: Attend church regularly.............8 Attend church quite often...........5 Attend church occasionally.........14 Rarely attend church................6 Never attend church.................5 A 12th.century Norman building with a narrow tower,Stackpole church also contains an interesting effigy.
